title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 195.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 195.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Authorized sign
shall mean a sign which is or may be erected and maintained within the

Adirondack or Catskill Park pursuant to a written permit required by section
9-0305
of the Environmental Conservation

Law and issued by the Department of Environmental Conservation. (b) Department shall mean the Department of

Environmental Conservation of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
195.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
